ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: MADRASA ARABIYYAH FAIZUL QURAAN (MAFQ) is a voluntary organisation (NGO), which was registered in 2016 under the West Bengal Societies Registration Act (1961). Our aim is to help women to become self-employed and stand equal to their male counterparts. Under privileged student development Major Projects are 1.Scholarship Awarness 2.Assistance in scholarship Form fill up 3.Career Counsdeling (Career Margdarshan) 4.Health Check-up Camps 5.Quiz,Debate,Essay writting, Drawing (Inter school/ Block /District / state) We provide information about scholarships â€“ right from class 1 to PhD levelWe keep students informed about their dates as well as new scholarships that come up to provide financial help to the needy and under privileged students in the society. It includes financial help too in the form of books & Tuition fees. We organize yearly career counselling in different places for high school students and we also organize different career oriented programs in various schools. We also Organize yearly health check-up camps under the supervision of multi-specialty hospitals and clinics for under privileged students and their guardians/parents. We organize quiz programs for school studnet which aims at promoting excellence in G.K. & Current Affairs. We organize yearly cultural fest where all the students perform dramatics and singing, essay writing, quiz & debate.and urdu promotinal with urdu coching centre &urdu seninar &mushaerah programme activitiese

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: MATILALCHAK NETAJI YUBA SANGHA Vill. Matilalchak, P.O. Janka, Dist. Purba Medinipur, Pin. 721431 Main Activities/ Achievement of the organization 01. Vocational Training Programme for unemployed youths and rural poor women.: 02. Creche Programme for the poor and backward children (0-6 years) of working mothers. 03. Awareness camps on AIDS prevention and control and Drug De-addiction. 04. Consumers Protection Activities for providing awareness due rights of the consumers. 05. Environmental Awareness for healthy atmosphere in the rural area including Plantation Programme. 06. Health Awareness Camp for good health of rural poor women and new born babies. 08. Awareness Camp for SC/ST Communities for their socio-economic development. 09. Women & Child Development Programme towards total development. 10. Awareness on Self Help Group and Income Generation Programme for socio-economic empowerment of rural poor women. 11. Disabled Welfare Programme for their socio-economic rehabilitation. 12. Awareness and orientation training programme on modern technique Of Agriculture & Horticulture Programme : 13. National Environmental Awareness Campaign through organizing padajatra, sit & draw, meeting/workshop, folk songs etc. 14. Charitable Dispensary for cheap and safe medical treatment for the poor, Aged, women and destitute. 15. Library Programme for upgradation of cultural atmosphere in the area. 16. Sanitation & Smokeless Chullah for creating a healthy and safe environment in the rural area as well to save the women from different deadly diseases. 17. Distribution of Books and Clothes for the poor students and destitute including poor aged, widow etc. 18. Annual Cultural Function and Sports & Games for youths, SHG women and children. 19. Nursery School for providing better education to the rural children towards their prosperous future. 20. Coaching Centre for the poor and meritorious students for continuing their studies. 21. Awareness Camp on Backward Classes for their socio-economic Development. 22. Tailoring Training under JSS for self employment of rural youths and women. 23. Observation of Red letter days with due respect. For and on behalf of the Matilalchak Netaji Yuba Sangha Secretary
